TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會發生事件時處於虛擬模式，以及已變更的項目範圍的選取狀態。The event occurs when the is in virtual mode, and the selection state of a range of items is changed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#482](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#482)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#482](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#482)]

MemberSignature.Value: public ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs (int startIndex, int endIndex, bool isSelected);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 startIndex, int32 endIndex, bool isSelected) cil managed
Public Sub New (startIndex As Integer, endIndex As Integer, isSelected As Boolean)
public: ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs(int startIndex, int endIndex, bool isSelected);

param.name: startIndex
param.span: 範圍中，已變更之第一個項目的索引。

span.span: The index of the first item in the range that has changed.

param.name: endIndex
param.span: 範圍中，已變更之最後一個項目的索引。

span.span: The index of the last item in the range that has changed.

param.name: isSelected
param.span: 表示已選取項目，而 則表示已取消選取項目。

span.span: to indicate the items are selected; to indicate the items are deselected.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在選取要取消選取此選項，並取消選取此選項為選取從變更的項目時，就會發生。The occurs when items are changed from selected to deselected, and deselected to selected. `isSelected`參數表示的項目範圍的目前狀態。The `isSelected` parameter indicates the current state of the range of items.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndIndex As Integer
public: property int EndIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得項目範圍中，其選取狀態已變更之最後一個項目的索引。

span.span: Gets the index for the last item in the range of items whose selection state has changed

value.span: 項目範圍中，其選取狀態已變更之最後一個項目的索引。

span.span: The index of the last item in the range of items whose selection state has changed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#482](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#482)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#482](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#482)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSelected As Boolean
public: property bool IsSelected { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否已選取此項目範圍。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the range of items is selected.

value.span: 如果已選取此項目範圍，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the range of items is selected; if the range of items is deselected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在選取要取消選取此選項，並取消選取此選項為選取從變更的項目時，就會發生。The occurs when items are changed from selected to deselected, and deselected to selected. `isSelected`參數表示的項目範圍的目前狀態。The `isSelected` parameter indicates the current state of the range of items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
